name: Affiliate
definition: party that is related to a legal entity, directly, or indirectly through one or more intermediaries, and controls, or is controlled by, or is under common control with that entity, typically determined by the degree of ownership
label: affiliate

name: Subsidiary
label: subsidiary
definition: legal entity that is entirely or majority owned and controlled by another legal entity
explanatoryNote: A subsidiary is a separate, distinct legal entity from its parent company(ies) for the purposes of taxation, regulatory compliance, and with respect to liability.

name: ControlledAffiliate
label: controlled affiliate
definition: controlled party in an affiliation situation

name: VotingShareholder
label: voting shareholder
definition: shareholder whose shares confer the right to vote in corporate elections, including the right to elect directors at annual or special meetings, and to express their views to corporate management and directors on significant issues that may affect the value of those shares

name: ControllingAffiliate
label: controlling affiliate
definition: controlling party in an affiliation situation

name: TotalControllingInterestParty
definition: voting shareholder that owns 100 percent of the voting shares in some legal entity
explanatoryNote: By virtue of holding 100 percent of the share ownership, the total controlling interest company also holds 100 percent of the controlling equity, if there is a difference. Therefore, it is both a total owner and a total controlling party.
label: total controlling interest party

name: SignificantShareholder
definition: party that owns a significant voting stake in an organization that is less than 50 percent but greater than some threshold
label: significant shareholder
explanatoryNote: Note that the concept of significance varies depending on the jurisdiction, and particularly with respect to reporting requirements. For example, in some cases, three (3) percent ownership of any class or series of shares is considered significant, and in others it means more than five or ten percent of the total combined voting power across all classes of securities.

name: JointVenturePartner
definition: party that shares capital, technology, human resources, risks, and benefits of an entity under shared control
label: joint venture partner

name: GlobalUltimateParent
label: global ultimate parent
definition: party that is recognized as the ultimate parent of a given organization world-wide

name: Affiliation
definition: situation in which a controlled party is affiliated with a controlling party for some period of time
label: affiliation

name: DomesticUltimateParent
definition: party that is recognized as the ultimate parent of a given organization within the country or jurisdiction of incorporation or organization
label: domestic ultimate parent

name: isControllingAffiliateOf
definition: controls directly, or indirectly through one or more intermediaries
label: is controlling affiliate of

name: isWhollyOwnedBy
label: is wholly owned by
definition: relates a legal entity to a party that has 100 percent ownership and control over it

name: isSubsidiaryOf
definition: is controlled directly, or indirectly through one or more intermediaries and owned at least 50 percent by
label: is subsidiary of

name: isParentCompanyOf
label: is parent company of
definition: indicates a controlled affiliate that it owns at least 50 percent of

name: isAffiliateOf
label: is affiliate of
definition: relates a party which directly, or indirectly through one or more intermediaries, controls, or is controlled by, or is under common control by another party to that party

name: hasGlobalUltimateParent
definition: relates an organization to another recognized as its ultimate parent, if it has one
label: has global ultimate parent

name: hasSubsidiary
definition: relates a legal entity to another organization that it owns at least 50 percent of
label: has subsidiary

name: hasControllingAffiliate
label: has controlling affiliate
definition: is directly, or indirectly through one or more intermediaries, controlled by

name: hasAffiliate
label: has affiliate
definition: has a party which directly, or indirectly through one or more intermediaries, controls, or is controlled by, or is under common control with the company

name: hasDomesticUltimateParent
definition: relates an organization to another recognized as its ultimate parent, within its country or jurisdiction of incorporation, if it has one
label: has domestic ultimate parent
